text: I’m having an issue right now where I can see the changes to the blog-index template in the design manager, but the blog is loading an older version of that file. Any issues right now?
I’m seeing different versions of my blog index template being used in different sections and different blogs in our account

hi at all! I don’t know if this is a right channel. Anyway, I have add site search module into my blog, insert search page in settings and it’s ok. My question is: search page is a template, not a real page like a post so can I tracking? Can i use Analytics on search page ? I would like know how many people use it.  Thank you and happy weekend
